A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I remember in June 1977 when the first movie came out. I have read almost all of the extended universe books since.  Theoretically\, I suppose\, this movie might have been worse\, but it feels like a gross violation of the franchise and the true believers.  I like Walt Disney\, but this destruction of a unique ecosystem blights their reputation. Calling this a Star Wars movie is a farce. Enjoy it if you like\, but don't pretend it is a Star Wars story.
